bioghist.p: Francis Reeve Cope, Jr. (1878-1962) was a member of the first Board of Trustees of Bryn Mawr College. He was also a longtime member of the Board of Directors of the Susquehanna County Historical Society and Free Library Association, and an amateur ornithologist and naturalist.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of the papers of Francis R. Cope, Jr. Materials include correspondence regarding employment regulations and College graduation requirements, brief financial statements, and newspaper clippings. Also included are reports to the Board of Trustees regarding an investigation of the fitness and veracity of M. Carey Thomas conducted in 1906 and 1907.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: Bryn Mawr College: Bryn Mawr College Board of Trustees records; Historical Society of Pennsylvania: Cope Family papers; Haverford College: Cope Family papers.
